creditline: Gift of the Weiser Family Foundation
description: packaged rectangular "collage" on corrugated cardboard; pink ground with black and white smears; red border with blue lines and green zigzag; packaged in plastic bag with cardboard hanging label stapled to top

title: Abstract Expressionism, from Trinket Carro/Chuchería Cart
